# 主营业务收入分析

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
codes <- "600000.SH,600016.SH,600036.SH,601166.SH"
report.dates <- unlist(strsplit("20140331,20140630,20140930,20141231,20150331,20150630,20150930,20151231", ","))
report.names <- unlist(strsplit("2014Q1,2014Q2,2014Q3,2014Q4,2015Q1,2015Q2,2015Q3,2015Q4", ","))

d <- data.frame(strsplit(codes, ","))
for (rd in report.dates) 
  d <- cbind(d, w.wss(codes, 'qfa_oper_rev', paste("rptDate=", rd), 'rptType=1')$Data[2])

d[-1] <- d[-1] / 100000000
colnames(d) <- c("code", report.names)

print(xtable(d), type="html", include.rownames=FALSE)
```
